Sygnal Pixel Helper is a powerful troubleshooting tool designed to help you seamlessly validate your Sygnal tracking pixel setup.
This lightweight browser extension runs quietly in the background, automatically scanning your website to detect any Sygnal pixel events in real-time. Once installed, the Sygnal Pixel Helper icon will display a small number indicating how many pixel events were detected on any given page.
Click the icon to view a comprehensive breakdown of these events, including detailed insights, warnings, and successes â€” allowing you to verify and optimize your Sygnal pixel integration effortlessly.
Get real-time feedback, resolve implementation issues quickly, and ensure your tracking is running smoothly with the Sygnal Pixel Helper.
